content: Execute Task 2.1: Write tests for module resolution and import/export functionality to fix API test utilities type issues
Analyze current API test utilities to identify NextApiRequest/Response type casting issues
Fix MockRequest/MockResponse to NextApiRequest/Response type casting in build() method
Fix handler parameter types from unknown to proper API handler function types
Fix mock response methods (_getStatusCode, _getData) to properly type mock response object
Run TypeScript compilation to verify API test utilities errors are resolved
Run tests to ensure all functionality still works after type fixes
Verify all tests pass and type improvements unblock other TypeScript fixes
